author: Staff Reporter
text:
Of the total 5.60 lakh saplings planned to be planted in the district, 5,57,207 saplings have been planted under various schemes, said V. Dakshinamoorthy, District Collector.

He inaugurated a programme organised by the School Education Department to plant 100 saplings in Government Boys Higher Secondary School in Namakkal by planting saplings.

Chief Educational Officer S. Gobidoss, Municipal Commissioner Senthil Murugan, and others were present.
title: 5.57 lakh saplings planted
